name: Tripswiper
tagline: An application that lets you swipe to plan your day in NYC.
body:
### Welcome to TripSwiper.
TripSwiper is an application that allows you to plan your day simply by swiping through possible choices of event. The application gives you choices in the form of cards, each of which can either be chosen or swiped away. Once a card is swiped, future choices are decided based on location.

### In Progress
This is a work in progress. We hope to bring you the best content possible in the future.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
